column1: The site will be under maintenance for about 5 minutes, then it will come back online.

column1: During this process the application cache will be flushed several times.

column1: The site may initially be slightly slower, but the pages you visit will progressively regenerate the cache.

column1: In case of errors during the automated installation, you may not receive the end deployment email.

column1: However, it will be completed manually and you will be notified of the end of the process through the uptime monitoring service.
